about_the_game:
Alchemy Academy plunges you into the heart of Calder, a city shadowed by imminent threats. Where does the danger stem from? Is it linked to the ancient Alchemy Academy, rumoured to be a hub of hidden, powerful secrets? Could the peril be the work of a secretive cult or perhaps the awakening of a forgotten god threatening to obliterate everything?

In Alchemy Academy, your decisions shape the story. This game boasts a deeply branching narrative where every choice has consequences. Explore the mysteries of the academy as a talented student, infiltrate secret societies for personal gains, or solve intricate puzzles as a detective. Perhaps you will lead a rebellion, influencing Calder’s future through force or diplomacy.

Your actions will determine not just your own fate but also the fate of the entire city. Will you safeguard Calder’s legacy or lead it to ruin? Engage with complex characters, navigate political intrigue, and master alchemical challenges that test your wit and moral compass.

Experience a world where ancient lore and modern dilemmas collide. Alchemy Academy offers a unique adventure every time you play, unveiling new secrets and paths based on your choices. How will you forge Calder’s destiny?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and later versions
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 512 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers

short_description: Danger looms over Calder and its citizens. Is it linked to the Alchemy Academy, the workings of a secretive cult, or an ancient god rising to erase the city? In this narrative game with multiple endings, each choice you make unfolds its own story.
